main.name: Jerusalem Darkera
main.description: I am a Biomedical & Full-Stack Software Engineer
main.bio: I currently work in the Medical Device industry where I help launch cutting edge healthcare technology by obtaining regulatory approvals worldwide. I am passionate about software & technology. So I've built side projects in bioinformatics, and a marketplace platform. Scroll down to see my work & thanks for being here!
main.contactmessage: Feel free to send me a message to connect. I'd be happy to chat!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: MBA, concentration in Project Management & Full-Stack Software Development Certification
education.description: I built two minimal viable software products during my MBA to solve problems I've personally experienced in my day-to-day work as a regulatory affairs specialist, and as a former business owner.

education.degree: B.S Biomedical Engineering and Six Sigma Green Belt Certification
education.description: As the vice president of our National Society of Black Engineers chapter, I hosted a diversity career fair sponsored by 10 companies & 125 attendees in 2017. I was 1 out 11 students selected from 10 CSU campuses to be a Presidents' Commission Scholars. I received 8000 USD to research directed growth of fibroblasts into micropatterned geometries.

work.title: Regulatory Affairs Specialist
work.description: I drive submissions through cross-functional collaboration & technical reviews to gain global market access for our medical devices. I've obtained regulatory approvals, increasing revenue forecast by 9% for respiratory devices. I optimized our operating model by creating a standardized workflow, boosting team productivity by 40%.

work.title: Co-Founder, Sales, and Partnerships
work.description: I co-founded 6irdview to build custom software by empowering top African engineering talent. I hired 6 off-shore engineers and managed 3 mobile & web app client projects. I was able to increase our revenue by 3x every quarter by negotiating partnerships, and closing 5-figure deals
